name: Yajiuma Pennant Race 2
overview: A baseball game supervised by former professional baseball player Koichi Tabuchi. Upgraded from the previous 6 teams to 12 teams. It is said to be the first PC game to be officially approved by the 12 Central League and 12 teams, and the player data etc. are registered with the teams and players in 1990 under their real names. New elements such as draft meetings have also been added, and caricatures of the directors of each team are also displayed in CG.
